cookies.name: sas-id
cookies.purpose: SAS Registration Cookie- This cookie contains the encrypted email ID of the user. It is used to identify the registered user account (if available) for each request.
cookies.duration: 1 day or 30 days (if “Remember me” is checked)

cookies.name: firsttime-login
cookies.purpose: SAS Registration Cookie- This cookie is used by SAS during the registration process to ensure that any necessary password updates are completed.

cookies.name: sas_overlay
cookies.purpose: SAS Registration Cookie- This cookie is used by SAS to make sure that the overlay (registration panel) opens once per browser session
cookies.duration: Until the end of the browser session

cookies.name: BIGipServerPOOL-69.20.11.37-Dispatch
cookies.purpose: This cookie is set by the servers hosting SAS sites to allow a visitor to receive site content from one out of multiple servers as the visitor browses the site. This improves performance and allows the visitor’s session to be maintained.

cookies.name: sas_closed_topics
cookies.purpose: This cookies is used by SAS to help personalize the content a user sees based on topics they've identified they're interested in.
cookies.duration: Until the end of the browser session

cookies.name: sas-cookie-accept
cookies.purpose: This cookie is used by SAS to understand whether or not a user has selected "I understand" in their cookie banner.
cookies.duration: Until the end of the browser session

cookies.name: sas_int_usr
cookies.purpose: This cookie is used by SAS to distinguish internal users from external visitors to the Websites. It is set when a person is accessing the website from within the SAS network (VPN or office).

cookies.name: _sdsat_landing_page
cookies.purpose: Stores the first page you hit when visiting sas.com

cookies.name: _sdsat_traffic_source
cookies.purpose: Stores the site you came from before reaching sas.com

cookies.name: _sdsat_pages_viewed
cookies.purpose: Stores the quantity (number) of pages that you view during your visit.

cookies.name: _sdsat_lt_pages_viewed
cookies.purpose: Stores the total number of pages viewed

cookies.name: _sdsat_session_count
cookies.purpose: Stores a session counter

cookies.name: s_vi
cookies.purpose: This cookie stores the visitor ID provided by our analytics provider whenever you first visit one of the Websites.

cookies.name: gpv
cookies.purpose: This cookie stores the quantity of pages you view when visiting the Websites

cookies.name: s_nr
cookies.purpose: This cookie stores the date(s) when you visit the Websites, and whether or not you are a new or returning visitor.

cookies.name: s_ppv
cookies.purpose: Stores information on the percentage of the page displayed

cookies.name: s_fid
cookies.purpose: This cookie is a "fallback" visitor identifier where the s_vi cookie is for some reason blocked. It contains a randomly generated unique ID

cookies.name: s_ppvl
cookies.purpose: Stores information on the percentage of the page displayed to you

cookies.name: s_cc
cookies.purpose: This cookie allows Adobe Analytics to determine whether or not cookies are enabled in your browser.

cookies.name: s_sq
cookies.purpose: This cookie is set and read by the JavaScript code when the ClickMap functionality and the Activity Map functionality are enabled; it contains information about the previous links that you clicked on the Websites.

cookies.name: dmdbase_cdc
cookies.purpose: This cookie is used to pass only the company name and firmographic attributes of a site visitor into analytics based on the source IP address. It is set using JavaScript.

cookies.name: dmpsh
cookies.purpose: This tracks the history of any ID syncs between TUUID and 3rd party exchanges

cookies.name: tuuid_lu
cookies.purpose: This tracks the date when the TUUID was last updated.

cookies.name: pvc
cookies.purpose: This cookie tracks post-view conversions for ad campaigns.

cookies.name: ssid
cookies.purpose: This cookie is set to assist in onsite identification for certain legacy campaigns.

cookies.name: _ga
cookies.purpose: This is a Google Analytics cookie

cookies.name: tuuid
cookies.purpose: This cookie is used for analytics and advertising services provided by Demandbase products.

cookies.name: IUUID
cookies.purpose: This cookie is used for performance and optimization of Demandbase data and reporting.

cookies.name: __utma
cookies.purpose: This is one of the four main cookies set by the Google Analytics service which enables website owners to track visitor behaviour and measure site performance. It it used to calculate new and returning visitor statistics. The cookie is updated every time data is sent to Google Analytics.

cookies.name: __utmv
cookies.purpose: Used to store visitor-level custom variable data. This cookie is created when a developer uses the _setCustomVar method with a visitor level custom variable. This cookie was also used for the deprecated _setVar method. The cookie is updated every time data is sent to Google Analytics.

cookies.name: __utmz
cookies.purpose: Stores the traffic source or campaign that explains how you reached the Websites. The cookie is created when the javascript library executes and is updated every time data is sent to Google Analytics.

cookies.name: VISITOR_INFO1_LIVE
cookies.purpose: This cookie tracks viewing of Youtube videos on the website.

title: Commonly used cookies on the Websites
description: The following cookies may be present on certain of the Websites, including but not limited to SAS.com/us and SAS.com/gx.

cookies.name: mbox
cookies.purpose: This cookie gives website operators the ability to test which online content and offers are more relevant to visitors. Click here for more information.

cookies.name: _ceir
cookies.purpose: This cookie is set by CrazyEgg and records whether you have visited the Website.

cookies.name: _ceg.s
cookies.purpose: This cookie is set by CrazyEgg and records anonymous usage activity on the site to help define heat maps and common user patterns to improve functionality and content development in the future.

cookies.name: _ceg.u
cookies.purpose: This cookie is set by CrazyEgg, in tandem with the anonymous usage patterns cookie, to understand repeat visitor patterns on the Websites.

cookies.name: _gat
cookies.purpose: This cookie name is associated with Google Universal Analytics, according to Google documentation it is used to throttle the request rate - limiting the collection of data on high traffic sites. It expires after 10 minutes.

cookies.name: _gid
cookies.purpose: This cookie stores a unique user session identifier.

cookies.name: _ga
cookies.purpose: This cookie is typically written to the browser upon the first visit to the Websites. If the cookie has been deleted by the browser operator, and the browser subsequently visits sas.com, a new _ga cookie is written with a different unique ID. In most cases, this cookie is used to understand whether a visitor is a single time visitor or a repeat visitor to the Websites and it is updated with each page view. Additionally, this cookie is provided with a unique ID that Google Analytics uses to ensure both the validity and accessibility of the cookie as an extra security measure.

cookies.name: __utmb
cookies.purpose: This cookie is used to determine new sessions/visits.

cookies.name: ELOQUA
cookies.purpose: This cookie is set by Eloqua and is used by certain of the Websites, including www.sas.com/US, to understand what content key contacts have viewed and what content interests those individuals. It is set when you first visit the site and updated on subsequent visits.

cookies.name: ELQSTATUS
cookies.purpose: This cookie is set by Eloqua and is used by certain of the Websites, including www.sas.com/US, to understand what content key contacts have viewed and what content interests those individuals. It is set when you are first visit the relevant Website and updated on subsequent visits.

cookies.name: ide
cookies.purpose: This is a Google UserID cookie used to help track users across various portions of the Websites.

cookies.name: nid
cookies.purpose: This is a Google UserID cookie used to help track users across various portions of the Websites.

cookies.name: uid
cookies.purpose: This is a Google UserID cookie used to help track users across various portions of the Websites.

cookies.name: BizoID
cookies.purpose: LinkedIn Ad analytics

cookies.name: UserMatchHistory
cookies.purpose: This cookie is used by LinkedIn for advertisement analytics
